TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AssociatedMetadataProvider extends System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadataProvider
Public MustInherit Class AssociatedMetadataProvider Inherits ModelMetadataProvider

summary.span: 提供用于实现元数据提供程序的抽象类。

span.span: Provides an abstract class to implement a metadata provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元数据提供程序提供模型的元数据。A metadata provider provides metadata for a model. 元数据提供程序必须派生自 。Metadata providers must derive from . 如果你要使用一个自定义验证程序或第三方验证程序，并且该自定义验证程序或第三方验证程序使用基于特性的元数据，则你可以从此类继承。You can inherit from this class if you want to use a custom validator or a third-party validator that uses attribute-based metadata. 此类实现类的抽象方法 ，并包含附加抽象方法。This class implements the abstract methods of the class and contains additional abstract methods. 实现此类时，请使用 类来实现验证程序。When you implement this class, use the class to implement the validator. 模型提供程序类与验证程序提供程序类是松散耦合的。Model provider classes and validator provider classes are loosely coupled. 因此，它们独立工作，彼此之间没有依赖关系。Therefore, they work independently and have no dependencies on each other. 但是，元数据提供程序将公开可由验证提供程序访问和使用的元数据。However, the metadata provider exposes metadata that can be accessed and used by validation providers. 例如，默认的元数据提供程序（ 类）读取对象的显示名称。For example, the default metadata provider (the class) reads the display name of an object. 此显示名称由 验证提供程序在创建验证错误消息时使用。This display name is used by the validation provider when it creates a validation error message.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，初始化派生自 的类的新实例。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates metadata for a model.

summary.span: 启动派生类筛选特性列表。

span.span: Enables derived classes to filter the list of attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类中的代码 返回所有属性。The code in the base class returns all attributes. 此方法允许派生类筛选属性。This method lets derived classes filter the attributes.
